```{r}
sum_err = function(df){ 
  err = 0
  for(i in 1:nrow(df)){
    r = df[i,]
    item_name = toString(r$item)
    ans_r = filter(ans_df, item==item_name)
    err = err + abs(r$rank - ans_r$rank)
  }
  return(err)
}
```

```{r}
sum_err(pre_df)
sum_err(mid_df)
sum_err(pas_df)
```

prefix = c("tom", "tok", "tei", "kom")

for(p in prefix){
  for(k in kind){
    path = paste("./", p, k, ".csv", sep = "")
    df = read.csv(path)
    print(paste(path, sum_err(df)))
  }
}
